1.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-login-redirect
1.0.description:
This plugin gives an option to buddypress based website owners to decide that where their users should be redirected after the login. Currently users can be redirected to 3 different locations after login. 1. Personal Profile / Personal Activity Page 2. Site wide Activity 3. Friends' Activity 4. Same page before log in

By default, this plugin will redirect the users to their friends' activity page after login.
